name.ja: <ruby>円<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>喚<rt>かん</rt></ruby><ruby>妖<rt>よう</rt></ruby><ruby>精<rt>せい</rt></ruby>キクロス

text.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can discard 1 card; add 1 Insect or Plant Tuner from your Deck to your hand, except "Kyklos the Circular Fairy". If an Insect and/or Plant Synchro Monster(s) is Special Summoned while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Kyklos the Circular Fairy" once per turn.
